title: Militias Battle In Libyan Cities As New Parliament Convenes
teaser: Three years after Moammar Gadhafi's ouster, Libya remains in political turmoil. Libyan Foreign Minister Mohamed Abdelaziz tells NPR's Arun Rath that the international community must follow through on its intervention.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
